Codeigniter Notes¶

URL Helper¶

Example url:

http://dev.example.com/search/type/aa/bb/cc

# echo base_url();
http://dev.ishoes.tw/

# echo uri_string();
search/type/a/b/c

# echo $this->uri->segment(1);
search

# echo $this->uri->segment(2);
type

# echo $this->uri->segment(3);
aa
